value.ddl:
CREATE TABLE `customers` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `first_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `last_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `email` (`email`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1005 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `orders` (
  `order_number` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `order_date` date NOT NULL,
  `purchaser` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `quantity` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `product_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`order_number`),
  KEY `order_customer` (`purchaser`),
  KEY `ordered_product` (`product_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `orders_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`purchaser`) REFERENCES `customers` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `orders_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`product_id`) REFERENCES `products` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10006 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `products` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL,
  `weight` float DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=110 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `products_on_hand` (
  `product_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `quantity` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`product_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `products_on_hand_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`product_id`) REFERENCES `products` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `dbz84_integer_types_table` (
  `colTinyIntA` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '100',
  `colTinyIntB` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '101',
  `colTinyIntC` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '102',
  `colTinyIntD` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '103',
  `colSmallIntA` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '200',
  `colSmallIntB` smallint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '201',
  `colSmallIntC` smallint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '201',
  `colSmallIntD` smallint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '201',
  `colMediumIntA` mediumint(9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '300',
  `colMediumIntB` mediumint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '301',
  `colMediumIntC` mediumint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '302',
  `colMediumIntD` mediumint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '303',
  `colIntA` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '400',
  `colIntB` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '401',
  `colIntC` int(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '402',
  `colIntD` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '403',
  `colBigIntA` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '500',
  `colBigIntB` bigint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '501',
  `colBigIntC` bigint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '502',
  `colBigIntD` bigint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '503'
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `dbz_100_enumsettest` (
  `c1` enum('a','b','c') DEFAULT NULL,
  `c2` set('a','b','c') DEFAULT NULL
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `dbz_102_charsettest` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `text` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2002 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `dbz_104_customers` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `first_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `last_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `email` (`email`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1005 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `dbz_114_zerovaluetest` (
  `c1` date DEFAULT NULL,
  `c2` time(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `c3` datetime(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `c4` timestamp(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(2) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(2)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `dbz_123_bitvaluetest` (
  `c1` bit(1) DEFAULT NULL,
  `c2` bit(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `c3` bit(8) NOT NULL,
  `c4` bit(64) DEFAULT NULL
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `dbz_147_decimalvalues` (
  `pk_column` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `decimal_value` decimal(7,2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`pk_column`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `dbz_85_fractest` (
  `c1` date DEFAULT NULL,
  `c2` time(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `c3` datetime(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `c4` timestamp(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(2) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(2)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `t1464075356413_testtable6` (
  `pk_column` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `varbinary_col` varbinary(20) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`pk_column`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `customers` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `first_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `last_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `email` (`email`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1005 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `orders` (
  `order_number` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `order_date` date NOT NULL,
  `purchaser` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `quantity` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `product_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`order_number`),
  KEY `order_customer` (`purchaser`),
  KEY `ordered_product` (`product_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `orders_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`purchaser`) REFERENCES `customers` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `orders_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`product_id`) REFERENCES `products` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10006 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `products` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL,
  `weight` float DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=110 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `products_on_hand` (
  `product_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `quantity` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`product_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `products_on_hand_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`product_id`) REFERENCES `products` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `dbz_126_jsontable` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `json` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `expectedJdbcStr` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL,
  `expectedBinlogStr` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=42 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

after.name: 12-pack drill bits
